Hi, I'm Ellesa. Pleased to meet you.

I'm a UX designer based in Manila, Philippines.

  1. UX Professional
  2. I love MAPS
  3. Coffee Junkie
  4. Frustrated Surfer
  5. Dragonmother

I'm always curious about how things work, or what makes things beautiful. And I'm fascinated by really clever designs.

I'm a passionate problem solver, so you can often find me gleefully solutioneering with a rainbow of pens, markers, post-its and my favorite Rocketpad. 

When I’m not designing, you would find me behind my gaming PC, writing with my latest thoughts on my blog, playing football or reading books upside down.
